title: A Hard Landing (CRS055)
description:
A Classic RISK! Singles episode! A story that JP Michael first shared on the podcast in July of 2016 about a relationship with a girl that developed a mystery illness.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (JP Michael, Kevin Allison)
